Russia-Ukraine war: Kiwi Ukrainians send 200 wheelchairs and 10 beds to frontline hospitals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Russia-ukraine-war-kiwi-ukrainians-send-200-wheelchairs-and-10-beds-to-frontline-hospitals/GSHDERM4RFAF3FYLD4Z6QUHPTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Russia-ukraine-war-kiwi-ukrainians-send-200-wheelchairs-and-10-beds-to-frontline-hospitals/GSHDERM4RFAF3FYLD4Z6QUHPTI/ David WilliamsOrganiser Edward Patkevych said hospitals in Ukraine are fighting for equipment. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 03:07:35 +0000 The local Ukrainian community is rallying to supply medical equipment to the country as the war drags into it's third year.

MPI investigating after large mouse spotted eating cereal at Pukekohe Woolworths, customers disgusted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mpi-investigating-after-large-mouse-spotted-eating-cereal-at-pukekohe-woolworths-customers-disgusted/OSICCJT2DZCIPAZLN3UE35DRXI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mpi-investigating-after-large-mouse-spotted-eating-cereal-at-pukekohe-woolworths-customers-disgusted/OSICCJT2DZCIPAZLN3UE35DRXI/ Benjamin PlummerOne customer who saw the rodent looked like she was going to be sick. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 02:57:02 +0000 Customers have been left disgusted after a mouse was spotted eating cereal at Woolworths Pukekohe South. Photo / Supplied
Sydney stabbings: Survivor of Dunedin supermarket knife attack reacts to Bondi mall mass stabbing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sydney-stabbings-survivor-of-dunedin-supermarket-knife-attack-reacts-to-bondi-mall-mass-stabbing/VMBVR2EPL5A4NK2A7ZZJ7BJPL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sydney-stabbings-survivor-of-dunedin-supermarket-knife-attack-reacts-to-bondi-mall-mass-stabbing/VMBVR2EPL5A4NK2A7ZZJ7BJPL4/ Ben TomsettDallas Wilson was stabbed four times while working at a Dunedin Countdown in 2021. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 02:48:40 +0000 Dallas Wilson, a senior manager at Countdown supermarket in central Dunedin, with his two sons. Wilson was stabbed four times while trying to wrestle a knife-bearing man during an unprovoked attack at the supermarket on May 10, 2021.

Stolen cars found in Manurewa: Driver claimed he didn’t know it had been nicked https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/stolen-cars-found-in-manurewa-driver-claimed-he-didnt-know-it-had-been-nicked/EHHKYCP6R5B4FAPAPUB4AJY5XM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/stolen-cars-found-in-manurewa-driver-claimed-he-didnt-know-it-had-been-nicked/EHHKYCP6R5B4FAPAPUB4AJY5XM/ Two stolen cars were found. One man is before the court while the other is investigated. Mon, 15 Apr 2024 02:21:19 +0000 Police found two stolen cars within half an hour in Manurewa on Sunday, arresting one man and putting him before court. Photo / Bevan Conley
